code: export function getFilename(url){const{pathname,searchParams}=new URL(url,'https://e');if(false){if(searchParams.has('unstable_path')){const encodedFilePath=decodeURIComponent(searchParams.get('unstable_path'));return getBasename(encodedFilePath);}}return getBasename(pathname);}function getBasename(pathname){return pathname.substring(pathname.lastIndexOf('/')+1);}export function getFileExtension(url){const filename=getFilename(url);const dotIndex=filename.lastIndexOf('.');return dotIndex>0?filename.substring(dotIndex):'';}export function getManifestBaseUrl(manifestUrl){const urlObject=new URL(manifestUrl);let nextProtocol=urlObject.protocol;if(nextProtocol==='exp:'){nextProtocol='http:';}else if(nextProtocol==='exps:'){nextProtocol='https:';}urlObject.protocol=nextProtocol;const directory=urlObject.pathname.substring(0,urlObject.pathname.lastIndexOf('/')+1);urlObject.pathname=directory;urlObject.search='';urlObject.hash='';return urlObject.protocol!==nextProtocol?urlObject.href.replace(urlObject.protocol,nextProtocol):urlObject.href;}
